Package knight

Class TheKnight

java.lang.Object
knight.TheKnight
public class TheKnight extends Object
Version:
Last refactored on 13.06.2022.

The one of the key classes of the game. Represents the main character and is implemented with usage of static modifiers As such, TheKnight Class operates as self contained instance of itself. Knight interactions are usually facilitated through the room getter in the Map class. See moveKnight for more info on knight movements. Knight holds most of the Main Character (directly) related actions, with notable exception of Spells class.

Author:
Martin Kadlec
See Also:
  • KnightCoordinates

  • Item

    • moveKnight

      public static void moveKnight(Scanner input)
      Accepts the user input as per given parameters and changes the numerical coordinates assigned to the knight. Temporary copies are made BEFORE the change. And are subsequently checked via try-catch block for outOfBoundsException. See more in validateMove method.
      Parameters:
      input - Passed Scanner object from the Main class
      See Also:
      • validateMove(int, int)

    • resolveAttack

      public static void resolveAttack(int damageValue, Monster enemyPresent)
      This method handles the damage dealt by the Knight to the other entities in combat. It works by simply taking already calculated randomized values which are added the TheKnight damage attribute. Math function then determines whether the hit is critical hit or not (double damage) and substracts the value of the enemy instance
      Parameters:
      damageValue - Integer - Precalculated value passed from Combat class with randomized damage modifier
      enemyPresent - Reference to the instance of currently fought monster

    • preventOverheal

      public static void preventOverheal()
      This function simply assures that currentHealth can never exceed MAX_HEALTH, take note that below zero checks are handled separately.

    • preventOvercast

      public static void preventOvercast()
      This function simply assures that currentMana can never exceed MAX_MANA, take note that below zero checks are handled separately.

    • printKnightStatusExploration

      public static void printKnightStatusExploration()
      This method prints the stats of the main character on demand.

    • printKnightStatusCombat

      public static void printKnightStatusCombat()
      This method prints stats relevant to the combat encounters each combat turn.

    • printInventoryContent

      public static void printInventoryContent()
      This method uses for-each loop to iterate over entire inventory, prints name of every consumable item. Take note that nothing is outputted for empty inventory

    • useItem

      public static void useItem(Scanner input)
      This method allows using items currently held in the inventory. Take note that this method can be called from combat as well as exploration. Prints warning message for user when attempting to use nonexistent item.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object passed from the Main

    • printCommandListExploration

      public static void printCommandListExploration()
      Prints the list of commands invoked during exploration with 'help' command.

      public static void printCommandListCombat()
      Prints the list of commands invoked during combat with 'help' command.
